programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpa’s pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Lady Monkey mech / Critter care calamity - Sir Steel wrecks havoc during Harvest Parade so Lady Fluffpot can shop in peace. Can Deer Squad save the parade? // Pollen from Bobbi's snuffleblooms makes everyone start getting super sneezes. Lola activates her Critter Care Centre to help everyone!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Paddington's Nature Club / Paddington's not Himself - Mr. Curry wants to become a ranger leader & creates nature club to impress Ms. Potts but are his facts correct? // Paddington has a fall and loses his climbing confidence - without climbing he doesn't feel like himself at all - what can he do?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep612
programme.desc: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery - When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep103
programme.desc: To The Lighthouse / The Golden Giant - When a storm blows out the lighthouse light, Santi and crew hurry to guide Mami and Abuelo back from sea. // When Enrique awakens a giant, Santi and crew must find a way to save the day.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Show Must Flow On - When Goldie's feeling down, Baby and friends decide to put on a musical to help her shine.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Zooli's New Pet! - Excited that Zooli is getting a new pet, the Guppies try to guess what kind of animal it is! Zooli loves many creatures, so her new pet could be anything in the animal kingdom. Will they guess the right one before it arrives?

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Trouble in Harmony Valley! - Everyone in the Old West town of Harmony Valley loves playing music together. But when noisy Billy Joe Strumlouder rides into town to sabotage their tunes, Sheriff Zooli must save the day--with music!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa’s ball blows into the pond and George’s hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching “Detective Potato” on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - It’s nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it’s been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep163
programme.desc: Switcheroo - When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born. Reversing roles, Froga will prepare lunch while Anna tends to Froga's strawberry plants.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep164
programme.desc: The Missing Socks - When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his SMELL BETTER MACHINE. When the machine ends one of Froga's beloved socks has disappeared. She's worried it's gone forever.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep619
programme.desc: Snow Rescue Blaze - When a big ski mishap gets Crusher and Pickle stuck super far away, Blaze and AJ will perform a daring snow rescue to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Pups Save an Ace / Pups Save a Wedding - When stunt pilot Ace runs into engine trouble, It’s up to Skye and the PAW Patrol to save her and her plane so the air show can go on! // After a big storm, the PAW Patrol must save Farmer Yumi's barn in time for his wedding!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Small Is Smashing / Pine Cone Power Up - Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees in the Central Forest to make way for his new tower. Deer Squad have to think small to stop him! // Lola and her souped-up Rocket Rabbit wake the residents of the Central Forest with all the engine's roars.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The duck who parped wolf - Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Paddington and the Big Decision / Paddington's Beach Stowaway - On the last day of the school holidays Jonathan & Judy can't agree on what to do so Paddington has the casting vote. // The Browns come back from a beach trip with more than sand in their hair - why is that shell moving on its own?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Treasure - Pirate Peppa and friends put together a chest of treasure and bury it in a marked spot. Soon Pedro needs to follow the trail as he realises he has lost something.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep622
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit in Space - Grampy Rabbit visits Peppa's playgroup to talk about space rockets. The talk is going very well until suddenly Grampy Rabbit looses his voice. Can Doctor Brown Bear get him talking again?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Peppa's Circus - Grandpa Pig has put up a tent in his garden. Peppa and her friends decide it's a perfect place to put on a circus. With Peppa as the ringmaster, the show can begin!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep624
programme.desc: The Fish Pond - Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to see a fish pond he used to visit when he was a little piggy. He is a little surprised to learn that a few things have changed since then.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep603
programme.desc: A Giant Harvest Day! - Holiday Cooks Molly and Gil, on a mission to save the town's Harvest Day (Thanksgiving) feast, must retrieve a Golden Tomato from magical Tall Tale Farms. But first, their food knowledge is tested by three guardians!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Pups Save the Squirrels / Pups Save a Roo - The PAW Patrol is on a roll when squirrels stash acorns in Alex's treehouse causing it to fall onto Daring Danny's skateboard! // It's a switcheroo situation when a joey is separated from its mama. It's up to the pups to save a roo and the day!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep165
programme.desc: The Mysterious Visitor - Bubu is eager to meet a real space alien so he builds a homemade antenna and sound box to communicate with outer space. He is amazed when he and Ron discover two glowing eyes. It must be the space alien!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep166
programme.desc: The Squeaky Boots - Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of HIDE AND SEEK. But Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy SQEEEAK. When a pesky mosquito enters the picture and threatens to ruin the winning prize!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Blaze of Glory - Blaze and his driver AJ are introduced to a world of racing Monster Machines. But when a truck named Crusher uses dirty tricks to try and win the Championship Race, Blaze will do everything to help his friends and beat Crusher to the finish line.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep210
programme.desc: The supersized sunflower / Moontaker - Ricardo hosts a sunflower competition, but Lola is worried hers is ill - surely a little Wood Power will perk it up? // Lady Fluffpot wants a statue made of moon rock, but the deer know that messing with the moon is a bad idea!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Paddington and the Caterpillar / The Floor is Lava - Paddington has a new caterpillar friend, and he and Judy learn that not all changes are bad! // The Browns take part in a very competitive game of The Floor is Lava but who will win and will they make a good impression on an important visitor?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Race to the Golden Gift - Blaze is joined by all of his friends in the Race to the Golden Gift! But to win, they'll first have to get past Crusher and his fresh batch of cheats.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep614
programme.desc: The Tiger Treasure - Blaze, AJ, and Stripes put their explorer skills to the test as they follow the trail to the fabled Tiger Treasure

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep203
programme.desc: A Tale of Two-más - It's Shipbuilding Day in Larimar and everyone pitches in, except Tomás who'd rather play music. While avoiding work, Tomás meets Pepito, a magic faun who offers to switch places and do his work for him.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Detective Baby Shark - When Grandma's shortcake goes missing before the bake-off, it's a case for Detective Baby Shark and William Watson!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep623
programme.desc: A Slow Day in Zippy City! - Everything is fast in Zippy City, from the trolley to the mail. But when Tiny the Slug and the Opposites Crew slow everything down to the opposite of fast with sticky slime, Detectives Zooli and Goby have to stop them before it's too late!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep624
programme.desc: See You Later Alligator! - Bayou Chicken Farmers Deema and Goby discover an unusual egg on their farm one morning, and set off on a bayou river adventure to find the egg's mama. Can they return the egg before it hatches...and before a big bayou gator catches them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Pirate Island - Grandpa and Granny Pig are taking Peppa, George and their friends to Pirate Island. Grandpa shows how to use his metal detector to find treasures and they all build a big sandcastle.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Jumble Sale - Peppa’s playgroup is holding a jumble sale to raise money for a new roof and Madame Gazelle asks everyone to bring something to sell. Peppa and her friends bring in an old toy but they soon realise that favourite toys can be hard to let go of.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Swimming - Peppa and her family are at the swimming pool. Rebecca Rabbit is there too. She and Peppa are very proud of their swimming skills. Everyone is surprised to discover that Daddy Pig is very good at swimming and diving. Very good indeed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Foggy Day - Mummy and Daddy Pig are taking Peppa and George to play in the playground. On the way it gets a bit foggy, and soon it is so foggy they can’t see. They decide to go home. But which way is home?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: From One Pit to Another - The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talent Show / Pups Save the Corn Roast - It's Adventure Bay Talent Show Day! When the mayor is afraid there won't be enough acts, the super talented Pups can definitely help out! // When Chickaletta gets trapped in a Corn Field Maze, the PAW Patrol races to the rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Pups Leave Marshall Home Alone / Pups Save the Deer - With the other pups at parachute training, Marshall must get a group of loose kittens back all by himself. But he has the help of the other pups' packs! // Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a family of deer stuck on slippery ice!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The wig of power - Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Paddington & The Tooth Fairy / Paddington Goes to Work - Judy loses a tooth quite literally- Will it be found in time for bed and will the tooth fairy like marmalade? // Paddington becomes a work bear and helps Mr. Brown in the home office but learns computers can be tricky things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Mr Potato's Christmas Show - Hoor-oink! It's Christmas, and Peppa's daycare is going to the theater to see a special play about the holiday. Some people have never been to a theater before.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep526
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle's Leaving Party - The children are sad because their favorite teacher, Madame Gazelle, is leaving daycare. But a leaving party will give her a good send-off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep601
programme.desc: The Queen - Miss Rabbit is to be given the Queen's Award for Industry, and Peppa and her friends are to accompany her to the palace to meet the Queen!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep602
programme.desc: Desert Island - When a fishing trip goes wrong, leaving Grandpa Pig, Granddad Dog, and Grampy Rabbit stranded on a desert island, Captain Daddy Dog is the only one able to save them.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship! - Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Something New at Blue's School - Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep621
programme.desc: Pirate Musical! - In the first ever Blaze Musical, Blaze, AJ, Crusher, and Pickle are on a daring quest to find the pieces of the Broken Key and unlock a secret treasure

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceañera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: The Welcome Wagon - When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep905
programme.desc: Pups Save a Humdinger Doll / Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest - With Tracker's help, the PAW Patrol must rescue Mayor Humdinger who has been mistaken for Big Hairy's missing toy doll. // When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Paddingtons New Neighbour / Paddington Makes the News - The Browns have new neighbors & Toq is full of tales like there's a goblin in the garden and her dad is an astronaut! They can't be true, can they? // Paddington, Jonathan & Judy decide to create a newspaper but they need a front page story!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pig’s office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbit’s job is all about numbers, Mrs Cat‘s job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pig’s job is complicated.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep167
programme.desc: The Greedy Gobbler - While Bubu and Christopher want to enjoy an hazelnut snack, their hazelnuts go missing! When Anna, Froga and Ron's chocolate snack also disappears, the friends are convinced it's the work of the GREEDY GOBBLER and the HAZELNUT PRANKSTERS.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep168
programme.desc: A Longchair for Ron - A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep47
programme.desc: The Counting Badge - The Squirrels try the ultimate achievement of counting to 100 to earn their counting badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep48
programme.desc: The Reunion Badge - Duggee hosts a reunion for the first ever Squirrels he looked after. But the first ever Squirrels are older now and very similar to the Squirrels' parents. Does that mean that when the Squirrels are bigger, they will become like their parents, too?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep49
programme.desc: The Building Block Badge - The Squirrels become architects so they can design, build and bring to life their very own clubhouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep28
programme.desc: The Aqueduct of Segovia - Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep29
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Grandmaster Glitch wants to watch his favourite DVD in peace, so uses his remote control to pause the Rio Carnival in Brazil!

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Heavy and Light - Kit and Pup are at the beach. Can you see who is carrying the heavy object and who is carrying the light object? Kit and Pup are also helping the little investigators discover whether big things are always heavier than small things.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) Ep15
programme.desc: Cloud - Dee encourages a friend to say 'cloud' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We explore rain clouds, snow clouds, funny clouds and someone even dresses up as a cloud!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep73
programme.desc: Sliding Down - The Tubby Car takes the Teletubbies to the Hidey Hup where they discover the Tubby Slidey. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po have great fun sliding down again and again.

programme.title: Clangers (S2) Ep20

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S02 Ep23
programme.desc: Big Pink Loser / Bubble Buddy - Patrick goes overboard when he takes Spongebob on as a role model. // Spongebob blows a bubble to keep him company when Patrick goes out of town.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Haunting of Star House / Who's a Big Boy? - Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but he ends up getting just what he paid for. // Patrick hits an unnatural growth spurt in his late adolescence.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep115
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Mail Off - Parker learns that the mail Drone the cloud accidentally destroyed has come back for revenge. Parker, Lily, and Mayor Peeve team up to stop the zombie mail Drone once and for all.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Lalo Land / Maybe-Sitter - The Casagrandes prepare Lalo for his big audition to be Phoebe Powers' new canine sidekick! // With the adults out for the night, Bobby and Carlota take turns watching the kids - and going to a party!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off / Tooth and Consequences - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition! // When Adelaide loses a tooth, Carl and Bobby teach her about El Raton, the Latin American "tooth fairy."

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep165
programme.desc: House Sittin' for Sandy / Smoothe Jazz at Bikini Bottom - All is quiet while SpongeBob is house-sitting for Sandy... until Patrick shows up! // SpongeBob and Squidward lose their passes and try desperately to sneak backstage at the sold-out Kelpy G show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep166
programme.desc: Bubble Trouble / The Way of the Sponge - When SpongeBob and Patrick accidentally destroy Sandy's air supply, they have to help her find more oxygen. // SpongeBob wants to earn his belt from karate master Fuzzy Acorns. Will Sandy be able to help?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: Plankton Gets the Boot - When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: Kids' Choice Awards 2023 S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Kids' Choice Awards 2023 - Coming in March 2023, KCA will be everything you expect from the number one awards show for kids and MORE. However, instead of a regular awards show, we’ll redefine reality as we embark on an adventure through the MAGICAL SURREAL world that is the KCAs 2023!​

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Camp Spirit / Help Not Wanted - SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy befriend a visiting ghost camper. // Patrick's dad unexpectedly visits Kamp Koral.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Unsmurfable Smile / Mind the Cat - Smurfette and Blossom try to make Grouchy smile by taking him on a camping trip. // Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Where's Papa Smurf? / Who's Heftier? - Papa Smurf disappears and the only way to make him visible again is to get a whisker from Azrael! // Wimpy challenges Hefty to a test of strength and wins by accident!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Bad Business / Anniversorry - Sammy are Hugo are running for Junior Business Club President, but when the votes come in they are tied...// Dada and Dadi's anniversary party is at the same time as arcade night! Can the boys find a way to be in two places at once?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep131
programme.desc: Keep Bikini Bottom Beautiful / A Pal for Gary - Squidward cleans up the city of Bikini Bottom with "help" from SpongeBob. // SpongeBob brings Gary a pet that terrorizes him.

programme.title: Best and Bester S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Get Shirty / This Solves Nothing - Best and Bester decide to trick feuding magicians "Shouty Shirt & Abrakapants" into doing their act one last time. // Diamondo is holding a mystery dinner party, but Best and Bester solve a real mystery that is not part of the game.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep115
programme.desc: I Know What You Did Last Mail Off - Parker learns that the mail Drone the cloud accidentally destroyed has come back for revenge. Parker, Lily, and Mayor Peeve team up to stop the zombie mail Drone once and for all.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Snack Pact / The Horror-Scope - The family discovers an amazing tamale cart and tries to keep it a secret from Abuela. // Ronnie Anne doesn't believe in an astrological prediction that 'love will find her,' until it seems to come true.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Arr in the Family / Finders Weepers - Ronnie Anne is determined to help CJ get onstage at a Pirate Dinner Show. // Ronnie and Sid have to decide whether they "borrow" money from a lost coin purse they found in the mercado.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Just Be Coo - When Sancho gets himself into trouble in the city, Sergio helps him become a model pet!

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Clone Babies / Flying Spiders - Feeling that being Captain Man is too much work for just one person, Ray and Schwoz hatch the perfect plan: clone Ray. // Captain Man & Kid Danger race against the clock to stop Daddy Longlegs from unleashing his army of spiders on Swellview.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Stair Wars / Enemies a la Mode - Patrick and GrandPat try to pass each other on the stairs, leading to a ludicrous conflict. // The members of the Star family each confront their own absurd rivalries.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lost in Couch / Pat-a-thon - Patrick loses the remote in the cushions, so he journeys into the couch to track it down. // Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep111
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants vs. The Big One - SpongeBob and his friends are swept away by a giant wave and find themselves stranded on a remote tropical island. To get back to Bikini Bottom, they need to learn how to surf from enigmatic surf guru, Jack Kahuna Lagun.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep112
programme.desc: Porous Pockets / Choir Boys - When SpongeBob suddenly becomes the richest citizen of Bikini Bottom, he finds himself surrounded by lots of new friends. // It's the day of Squidward's lead solo audition with the Bikini Bottom Men's Choir, and Squidward is brimming with excitement.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S06 Ep113
programme.desc: Krusty Krushers / The Card - Mr. Krabs hatches up another get-rich-quick scheme: professional wrestling! But Mr. Krabs isn't the one who's going to wrestle. // The new Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy trading cards are on sale, and Bob is determined to get the rare talking card.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S03 Ep42
programme.desc: My Pretty Seahorse - SpongeBob finds a stray sea horse and adopts it.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep401
programme.desc: The Toy / Bloodline - A favorite toy of Theodore's is lost on a rafting trip but then mysteriously shows up at the house, and it's alive! // When the boys send Dave's DNA sample to a testing lab the results show he's related to Jack The Ripper!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Theodore's Calling / Clumsy Jeanette - Miss Croner attempts to help Theodore discover his true calling in life. // Jeanette is suddenly the clumsiest person on the planet. Is there something wrong with her... or her new glasses?

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Trick or Squeak / Mayors for a Day - On a spooky Horse-O-Ween night, Corn and Peg befriend a bat and pledge to give it the best home ever! // After being elected 'Mayors for the Day', Corn and Peg have to find a fair way to make sure the citizens of Galloping Grove are all happy.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Friendship Day / Cowboy Canyon - After discovering that Carrier Pintock won't be able to see her sister on Friendship Day, the do-gooders set off on a journey to bring the siblings together! // Corn and Peg cross the wild west of Cowboy Canyon to find Clarissa's missing phone.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Rocket Trouble / The Brave and the Mold - Buckle up, duckies! The rocket van is about to get some sweet mods from ace-mechanic Ketta. // Mold strikes the bread mines, and the only ones who can strike back are TRUE Breadwinners.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep120

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Tales Ep10C/Ep14B/Ep2B/Ep17C/Ep3C/Ep21A/Ep13A/Ep24C
programme.desc: Polar Peril/Catch Me Though You Can't/Fraidycat Scat/Jungle Love/The Itch/Bend It Like Thomas/Tin Cat of Tomorrow/Flamenco Fiasco - Tom and Butch team up to catch Jerry in the arctic north, but they must evade Jerry's polar bear friend to claim their mouse-meal prize.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry Theatricals Ep20/Ep62/Ep83/Ep119/Ep13/Ep5/Ep124/Ep31
programme.desc: The Dog House/Milky Waif/Pup on a Picnic/Touche Pussycat/Cat Concerto/The Bodyguard/Unshrinkable Jerry Mouse/The Flying Cat - Spike tries to build a dog house of his very own, but the cat and mouse chase always destroy his efforts.

programme.title: Ben 10 Ep113/Ep153/Ep192/Ep214/Ep248
programme.desc: Don't Let the Bass Drop/Drone On/Bridge Out/The Claws Of The Cat/Tales From The Omnitrix - Ben and Gwen are excited to attend an Earth Day EDM concert in Portland until the show is hijacked by the sound-manipulating baddy Lord Decibel.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls Ep112/Ep153/Ep197/Ep129/Ep169
programme.desc: Secret Swapper of Doom/Buttercup Vs. Math/Largo/Presidential Punchout/Bridezilla - The girls get a Paper Fortune Teller that can predict the future if they tell it a secret. But soon it predicts the Powerpuff Girls will be destroyed!

programme.title: Chowder Ep6B/Ep27B/Ep16B/Ep46B
programme.desc: The Wrong Customer/Won-Ton Bombs/Brain Grub/Chowder's Magazine - An unexpected outlaw unwittingly turns the catering company into his hideout.

programme.title: Foster's Home For Imaginary Friends Ep38/Ep42
programme.desc: Room With A Fued/Squeeze The Day - Who will win the new spare room?

programme.title: Journey Of Long Ep12/Ep26/Ep38/Ep52
programme.desc: Impossible Delivery/A Lucky Charm/Sudden Magic Show/Final Showdown - Long has to complete delivery mission under the scorching sun and boiling heat of the summer.

programme.title: Talking Tom And Friends Ep12/Ep504/Ep14/Ep514/Ep13
programme.desc: Movie Star Angelo/Micro Spy Tom/The Mystery of the Pyramid/Alert! Parents In Town/The Secret Life of Ms Vanthrax - Talking Angela's favourite superhero is getting her own movie. But when the director says the role will be played by a guy, Angela disguises herself as a dude to get the part.

programme.title: Brave Bunnies Ep141/Ep142/Ep143/Ep136/Ep137/Ep138/Ep139/Ep140
programme.desc: An Extraordinary Tail/A Foggy Fable/Savannah Race/An Interesting Hunt/What Now?/Bubble Trouble/Let's Roar!/Night Visitor - The Brave Bunnies stop in a Jungle to collect seeds for their garden. Bop and Boo meet Percy, a proud PEACOCK, who can't resist boasting about his extraordinary tail!

programme.title: Esme & Roy Ep206/Ep212/Ep213/Ep214/Ep215
programme.desc: Don't Bug Me/Lickety Split/The Show Must Go On/Not Kitten Around/It’S In The Bag - Esme and Roy are playing with Sid and Lucy at the park. But when bugs start crawling on the scene, Sid gets nervous.

programme.title: Ranger Rob Ep321/Ep322/Ep323/Ep324/Ep325
programme.desc: Winging It In Big Sky Park/The DeEp.Sea Divers Of Big Sky Park/Learning The Ranger Ropes/A Yeti Sleepover In Bsp/Sam ‘N Go Seek In Big Sky Park - Rob is given a giant feather and heads out to find which bird it came from.

programme.title: Mecha Builders Ep111/Ep109
programme.desc: The Whatsacallit Of Treetop Woods/ Nat In The Dark!/That's The Way The Windmill Blows!/ Mecha Machine Makers! - Berta is opening an exhibit on the Whatsacallit of Treetop Woods.

programme.title: Be Cool Scooby-Doo! Ep9/Ep22

programme.desc: Peel Of Fortune/We're In Big Truffle - Bugs and Daffy have a reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Mumfie Ep133/Ep134/Ep135/Ep136/Ep137/Ep138/Ep139/Ep140
programme.desc: An Almost Perfect Cake/The Broken Sunflower/Replacement Captain/The Lighthouse/The Great Crossing Of The Island/A Little Joke/The Imaginary Illness/A Clean Bay - Mumfie and Jelly Bean, trying to imitate the way Mr. Bernard does culinary criticism, comment at great length on a cake that Pinkey has just baked for them.

programme.title: Monchhichi Tribe Ep121/Ep122/Ep123/Ep124/Ep125

programme.desc: Mediterranean Journey Cyprus - As legend would have it, Aphrodite was born here - on Cyprus. The sea on its southern coastline is said to be the font of all love. The island is one of the oldest cradles of civilization in the Mediterranean: The Greeks, Egyptians, Romans, Ottomans and British all lived here at some point in history.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: How I Became Sadio Mané - Bayern Munich star Sadio Mané has won the Champions League and the Premier League with Liverpool, and the Africa Cup of Nations with Senegal. But none of this came easy. Mané has worked incredibly hard, and faced countless setbacks on and off the pitch, to reach football's pinnacle. This is the story of how Sadio Mané became the humble man he is today and one of the world's best attacking players.

programme.desc: How I Became Sadio Mané - Bayern Munich star Sadio Mané has won the Champions League and the Premier League with Liverpool, and the Africa Cup of Nations with Senegal. This is the story of how Sadio Mané became the humble man he is today and one of the world's best attacking players.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC279DiazvsFerguson
programme.desc: UFC 279 was headlined by a bout between two UFC legends and Ultimate Fighter winners: Nate Diaz and Tony “El Cucuy” Ferguson. Plus, Khamzat Chimaev faced rival Kevin Holland. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC280OliveiravsMakhachev
programme.desc: UFC 280 featured a battle for the vacant lightweight title between former champion Charles Oliveira and Islam Makhachev. Plus, Aljamain Sterling defended his bantamweight belt against TJ Dillashaw. See the whole main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep5
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2252
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The event was first held in 1987 at the Jarama circuit in Spain. The reason for this was because the main Portuguese circuit at the time, the Circuito do Estoril, was not yet ready to be used for motorcycle racing. However, Portugal still wanted to host a round in the championship that year, and so opted to use the Jarama circuit until their own was ready for use. In 1988, a second race was held at the new Jerez circuit which was also located in Spain.[1] The original plan was to host the race in Portugal at the Estoril circuit, but Jerez was chosen instead. The race was also named 'EXPO '92', referring to the expo of a similar name held at the Spanish city of Seville that year. This makes Portugal the only country to host multiple grands prix under Portuguese flag and name, despite the locations of the venues not being located in the country itself.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2252
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Main Event - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: Middleweight champion Israel “The Last Stylebender” Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert “The Reaper” Whittaker”. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili
programme.desc: Prelims - A relentless force meets an immovable tank on March 11 when former bantamweight champion Petr “No Mercy” Yan faces Merab “The Machine” Dvalishvili in a highly anticipatedUFC Fight Night main event at The Theater at Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. On the road to regaining his 135-pound crown, Yan’s resume includes knockouts of Urijah Faber and Jose Aldo, and he plans on adding Dvalishvili’s name to that list, but with eight consecutive wins and an aggressive attack that has seen him defeat Aldo, Marlon Moraes and Cody Stamann, “The Machine” is no one’s stepping stone

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Yan vs. Dvalishvili

programme.title: Grande Prémio Tissot de Portugal Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The event was first held in 1987 at the Jarama circuit in Spain. The reason for this was because the main Portuguese circuit at the time, the Circuito do Estoril, was not yet ready to be used for motorcycle racing. However, Portugal still wanted to host a round in the championship that year, and so opted to use the Jarama circuit until their own was ready for use. In 1988, a second race was held at the new Jerez circuit which was also located in Spain.[1] The original plan was to host the race in Portugal at the Estoril circuit, but Jerez was chosen instead. The race was also named 'EXPO '92', referring to the expo of a similar name held at the Spanish city of Seville that year. This makes Portugal the only country to host multiple grands prix under Portuguese flag and name, despite the locations of the venues not being located in the country itself.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2252
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
programme.desc: Prelims - The undisputed UFC heavyweight championship will be on the line on March 5 when former 205-pound champion Jon Jones makes the move north to face France’s Ciryl Gane in the main event of UFC 285 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. A top contender who has won 11 of his 12 pro bouts, defeating the likes of Derrick Lewis, Junior Dos Santos and Tai Tuivasa while also wearing the interim heavyweight title belt, Gane now has the vacant undisputed crown in his sights, but to get it, he has to hold off the charge of UFC superstar Jones, whose storied career in the light heavyweight division now gets a second chapter among the heavyweights, where “Bones” will attempt to make history by becoming a two-division champion. Plus, Valentina Shevchenko will look to continue her dominant reign atop the flyweight division when she faces surging Mexican contender Alexa Grasso for the 125-pound crown.

programme.title: UFC 285: Jones vs. Gane
